title: Idle Fiddlesticks freeze
body:
Idling with Fiddles until his passive activates makes him unresponsive to /taunt, /joke, /laugh etc etc....
Is that intended or some sort of a bug?

replies.body: I really don't like this change. It would have been much interesting if he did his draining or ult channel position instead.

This is intended: http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-610-notes

Fiddlesticks will stop moving completely and act like a scarecrow after 5 seconds of being idle

> [{quoted}](name=FlashnFuse,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=yZ9OXTqu,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-05-20T08:34:45.342+0000)
>
> This is intended: http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-610-notes
> 
> Fiddlesticks will stop moving completely and act like a scarecrow after 5 seconds of being idle

That one time I don't read patch notes....
I only tried with key bindings, but, lets say I left him to dance, and he freezes mid dance as well.

Is that through the chat box?

Or key bindings?
